thread.title: Cuomo, New York Lawmakers Continue Haggling Over Budget

author: Mike Vilensky
title: Cuomo, New York Lawmakers Continue Haggling Over Budget

organizations.name: new york lawmakers continue haggling over budget

text:
ALBANY—Gov. Andrew Cuomo and state lawmakers continued haggling over the state’s $160 billion budget Thursday night ahead of plans to leave the Capitol Friday for religious holidays.
Mr. Cuomo, a Democrat, talked with leaders of the Republican-led Senate and Democratic-led Assembly mostly behind closed doors in the governor’s office at the state Capitol, as they faced an April 1 deadline.
Late...
